title: MBMBaM 503: How to Get Away with Pinkbelly
description:
Listen, y’all. There’s only one way that we’re getting through this thing, and I think we all know exactly what way I’m talking about. It is imperative, now more than ever, that we get Richard Gere to be a top-tier YouTuber.

Suggested talking points: What’s Funny?!, Lying Ants, Snip Tunes, Roughhousing, Netflix Prophecies, Liminal Chalupa
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
